snippet: MICHEL--Ernest W. The Yeshiva University family is deeply saddened by the loss of Ernie Michel, a beloved and cherished Jewish communal leader who committed his entire life to strengthen the Jewish community having lived and survived through the horrors of the Holocaust. Yeshiva University was extremely proud to bestow an Honorary Doctoral Degree upon Ernie to recognize his leadership to the Jewish community and to serve as a role model for our students. May the entire family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Yeshiva University Richard M. Joel, President Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3
